rules: You do not need to import React in each component file; assume it's globally available.
When creating a new component, always use design tokens for colors, font sizes, and spacing values.
View component designs in Figma using the provided links in figma.config.json.
Always ensure components are in a folder using Pascal Case naming conventions.
Folders should include the tsx file, a css module file, a jest test file if appropriate, and an index.ts file for exports.
Use the clsx library for conditional class names in React components.
